answers.answer: HiNumbness and now the left side of  the body can be due to a lot of causes like a stroke, hemorrhage, tumor, arteriovenous malformation , effect of some medication, cervical spine disorder, diabetes, arthritis, HIV, lyme disease, etc.Do you have any history of raised cholesterol, raised BP, diabetes, cervical spidylosis or any other medical problems?I would advise that you should consult a neurologist with your past medical and neurological examination and tests like CT scan, MRI or lumbar puncture, as appropriate, would be able to diagnose your condition.Do write in if you need some other information.Take care!

question: my left thigh has had numbness and now the left side of my face has numbness.  What could cause this?
title: numbness
